resources:
Hangman ‚óè Save the man from hanging. You must guess the hidden word by clicking on the correct letter. A correct letter gives you 50 points but if you choose a wrong letter you will lose a life and 5 points. You can continue as long as you guess the correct word, but if you lose your highscore will be stored when clicking on the button. Congratulation you guessed the correct word Continue How to play Play Life your score is: Amount of guesses: Oh, you lost! The word was: . Highscore Check if you have beaten the highscore. Name
